title: EDM Gaming IV - Game Music Pack - Arcade, Rhythm, Electronic Game Music
description: Made exclusively for Arcade, Racing and Rhythm games, EDM Gaming IV is a game music pack that brings life to your games.
longDescription:
From normal heroes who want to save the futuristic city, to talking animals with edgy outfits. EDM Gaming IV is made for those stories that we all love.


– Listen to this Soundtrack Pack here.


What’s Inside:

– 7 original high-quality music

– 15 original high-quality music loops

– 22 total files


Tracklist:

01 - Bitonal Landscape - INKTOBER 

02 - Crystal Clear 

03 - Egipt 7 

04 - District 9 

05 - Multiplanetary 

06 - Bitonal Landscape - Original 

07 - Bitonal Landscape - Hello


(All file formats are in WAV, Stereo, 44.8kHz, 24bit)


With this game music/soundtrack pack, you also:

– Sounds great in any device: All music themes and stingers are fully mixed and mastered, so they sound great in any device that your game is played.

– Avoid incongruent volumes: All themes and stingers are mastered to reach a fully congruent volume within the full soundtrack.

– Repeat music seamlessly: All music themes are fully loop-able, so you can repeat the music in the game seamlessly.


About Composer:

Lufus is a music producer, composer who has made the Original Soundtrack of multi-million games like:

– Parchisi Star Online (50 Million Downloads)

– Pixel Car Racer (10 Million Downloads)

– Drift Clash (5 Million Downloads) and more


Support & Help:

If you need help downloading this soundtrack/music pack, feel free to reach out to iamlufus@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Features:

Number of Audio WAVs: 22

Number of Audio Cues: 7 Music Tracks, 15 Music Loops

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.8kHz / 24bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 23


Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes (WAV files are universally compatible)
  • Mac: Yes (WAV files are universally compatible)


Documentation: – Listen to this Soundtrack Pack here.. Users can contact the composer at iamlufus@gmail.com for support.


Important/Additional Notes:

  • Genre: EDM, suitable for futuristic cityscapes, action games, games with edgy characters.
  • Composer: Lufus, with experience in popular mobile games.
  • Quality: High-quality, fully mixed and mastered for consistent volume across tracks and seamless looping.
  • Usage Rights: Not explicitly stated, contact the composer for clarification.
